p: In the case of VZV encephalitis the dose is higher, namely 15 mg/kg 8 hourly for 14 days in all age groups. Treatment should be continued if the patient is immunocompromised [ 10]. VZV cerebellitis does not require treatment, because it is a self-limiting disease resolving within 3 weeks [ 10], but if vasculopathy is present corticosteroids are indicated [ 10].
